attributes.action: make public the identities of people convicted of sexual offences towards children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Parents deserve the right to protect their children from sexual predators.
Therefore I propose the government publish County by County a list of those who have been convicted of sexual offences against children, it is about time the protection these people get is removed and that it is given to the children instead.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
